description:
NAME 
git-update-ref - Update the object name stored in a ref
safely

flags.description:
If --no-deref is given,
<ref> itself is overwritten, rather than the 
result of following the symbolic pointers.

With -d flag, it deletes the
named <ref> after verifying it still 
contains <oldvalue>.

With --stdin, update-ref reads
instructions from standard input and 
performs all modifications together. Specify commands of the
form:

With --create-reflog, update-ref
will create a reflog for each ref even 
if one would not ordinarily be created.
